title: Rauhhügel
text:
The Rauhhügel is an 812.9 m high (above <a href="sea%20level">sea level</a>) <a href="mountain">mountain</a> located in the <a href="Thuringian%20Highland">Thuringian Highland</a>, <a href="Thuringia">Thuringia</a> (<a href="Germany">Germany</a>).
It is located close to the municipalities of <a href="Schmiedefeld%20%28Lichtetal%29">Schmiedefeld</a> and <a href="Lichte">Lichte</a> and the <a href="Leibis-Lichte%20Dam">Leibis-Lichte Dam</a> in the <a href="Saalfeld-Rudolstadt">Saalfeld-Rudolstadt district</a> in the <a href="Thuringian%20Forest%20Nature%20Park">Thuringian Forest Nature Park</a> within walking distance of the <a href="Rennsteig">Rennsteig</a>.
The Leipzig tower on top of the Rauhhügel is 17.5 m high. It has viewing platforms on two levels, the upper at 14 m, from which in good weather one can see far into the surrounding mountains of the Thuringian Highland, the <a href="Thuringian%20Forest">Thuringian Forest</a> and to mountains of the <a href="Fichtelgebirge">Fichtelgebirge</a> and the <a href="Erzgebirge">Erzgebirge</a>, including:
There is a guesthouse at the base of the tower.
